actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow the duty-free entry of an additional quantity of green peanuts that are the product of Mexico.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow the duty-free entry, from January 1 through April 30, of an additional quantity of Mexican immature (green) peanuts (to be marketed for consumption as boiled peanuts).

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow the duty-free entry of an additional quantity of green peanuts that are the product of Mexico.
